input.sentences: the fourth of july is my favorite time of year .
i always enjoy the vibrant colors of the fireworks .
fireworks are so amazing to witness at night when they light up the sky .
i especially enjoy the fireworks that have sparkles and make loud noises .
i look forward to the fourth of july every year and ca n't wait until next year .
output.sentences: It's time to celebrate with fireworks on july the fourth.
It starts off with vibrant and loud fireworks that everyone enjoys.
As i witness up in the sky the fireworks pops in front of the night sky.
Going towards the end the fireworks begins to sparkle and the noises get louder and louder.
I can't wait for July the fourth to come again.
